ComicInfo.Summary:
More creatures! More humor! Liana Kangas (Trve Kvlt) and Jazzlyn Stone take us on a high-seas adventure with a mermaid made for vengeance, featuring lyrical art by Ted & Ro. Then Henry Barajas (Beyondtopia Legends) and Salomée Luce-Antoinette take us to France’s southeast countryside to confront the fierce and terrifying beast of Gevudan.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-01-21 21:12:17. [Issue ID 1036494]
